about_the_game:
Adds time acceleration to the game Russian Train Trip 2, to see all the content, all the train stations and not to spend 10 hours playing the game.
Extra content for the lazy :)

There are some points:

  • Time acceleration can only be enabled after visiting the first "Pillars" station
  • Time is sped up 20 times.
  • Press SHIFT+P to go back to normal time and press SHIFT+L to go back to normal time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950 4GBGTX 960 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
